titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Seattle Storm women's basketball team on winning the 2018 Women's National Basketball Association championship.
A resolution congratulating the Seattle Storm women's basketball team on winning the 2018 Women's National Basketball Association championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Recognizes the achievements of the players, coaches, fans, and staff whose dedication has helped the Seattle Storm women's basketball team win the 2018 Women's National Basketball Association championship.
